dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the MMDVFS OPP3 issue and the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as root causes.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately identified most metrics but missed some specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The diagnostic reasoning is logical and flows well, correctly identifying MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could be more detailed regarding historical fixes.
